categories: Category:Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi

nodes.text: The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 4

"The Weapon of a Jedi, Part 4" (German: "Die Waffe eines Jedi, Teil 4") is the fourth and final installment of "Star Wars: The Weapon of a Jedi," the comic adaptation of Jason Fry's novel The Weapon of a Jedi: A Luke Skywalker Adventure. Written by Alec Worley and drawn by Ruairí Coleman, with colors by Chris O'Halloran, it was printed in issue 22 of "Star Wars - The Official Magazine" and published on September 13, 2017.
